trans-unit.source: Provides a strongly typed collection for <xref href="System.Web.SiteMapNode"></xref> objects and implements the <xref href="System.Web.UI.IHierarchicalEnumerable"></xref> interface to support navigating through the collection.
trans-unit.target: Fornisce una raccolta fortemente tipizzata per <xref href="System.Web.SiteMapNode"> </xref> oggetti e implementa il <xref href="System.Web.UI.IHierarchicalEnumerable"> </xref> interfaccia per supportare lo spostamento nella raccolta.

trans-unit.source: The SiteMapNodeCollection class provides a strongly typed collection for <xref:System.Web.SiteMapNode> objects.
trans-unit.target: La classe SiteMapNodeCollection fornisce una raccolta fortemente tipizzata per <xref:System.Web.SiteMapNode>oggetti.</xref:System.Web.SiteMapNode>

trans-unit.source: It stores <xref:System.Web.SiteMapNode> objects internally in a zero-based array.
trans-unit.target: Archivia <xref:System.Web.SiteMapNode>oggetti internamente in una matrice in base zero.</xref:System.Web.SiteMapNode>

trans-unit.source: You can modify a SiteMapNodeCollection collection when it is first created, and then use the following methods to add, copy, and remove <xref:System.Web.SiteMapNode> objects: - To add <xref:System.Web.SiteMapNode> objects, use the <xref:System.Web.SiteMapNodeCollection.Add%2A>, <xref:System.Web.SiteMapNodeCollection.AddRange%2A>, and <xref:System.Web.SiteMapNodeCollection.Insert%2A> methods.
trans-unit.target: È possibile modificare una raccolta di SiteMapNodeCollection quando viene creato e quindi utilizzare i metodi seguenti per aggiungere, copiare e rimuovere <xref:System.Web.SiteMapNode>oggetti:: per aggiungere <xref:System.Web.SiteMapNode>oggetti, utilizzare il <xref:System.Web.SiteMapNodeCollection.Add%2A>, <xref:System.Web.SiteMapNodeCollection.AddRange%2A>, e <xref:System.Web.SiteMapNodeCollection.Insert%2A>metodi.</xref:System.Web.SiteMapNodeCollection.Insert%2A> </xref:System.Web.SiteMapNodeCollection.AddRange%2A> </xref:System.Web.SiteMapNodeCollection.Add%2A> </xref:System.Web.SiteMapNode> </xref:System.Web.SiteMapNode>

trans-unit.source: - To copy <xref:System.Web.SiteMapNode> objects, use the <xref:System.Web.SiteMapNodeCollection.CopyTo%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: -Per copiare <xref:System.Web.SiteMapNode>oggetti, utilizzare il <xref:System.Web.SiteMapNodeCollection.CopyTo%2A>metodo.</xref:System.Web.SiteMapNodeCollection.CopyTo%2A> </xref:System.Web.SiteMapNode>

trans-unit.source: - To remove <xref:System.Web.SiteMapNode> objects, use the <xref:System.Web.SiteMapNodeCollection.Remove%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: -Per rimuovere <xref:System.Web.SiteMapNode>oggetti, utilizzare il <xref:System.Web.SiteMapNodeCollection.Remove%2A>metodo.</xref:System.Web.SiteMapNodeCollection.Remove%2A> </xref:System.Web.SiteMapNode>

trans-unit.source: You can create a read-only SiteMapNodeCollection, which does not permit adding, copying, nor removing <xref:System.Web.SiteMapNode> objects, by using the static <xref:System.Web.SiteMapNodeCollection.ReadOnly%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: È possibile creare un SiteMapNodeCollection di sola lettura, che non consente l'aggiunta, la copia o la rimozione <xref:System.Web.SiteMapNode>oggetti, tramite il metodo statico <xref:System.Web.SiteMapNodeCollection.ReadOnly%2A>metodo.</xref:System.Web.SiteMapNodeCollection.ReadOnly%2A> </xref:System.Web.SiteMapNode>

trans-unit.source: The SiteMapNodeCollection collections that are returned by the <xref:System.Web.SiteMapNode.GetAllNodes%2A?displayProperty=fullName> and <xref:System.Web.UI.IHierarchyData.GetChildren%2A> methods are read-only, as is the SiteMapNodeCollection that is returned when the <xref:System.Web.SiteMapNode.ChildNodes%2A> property is accessed on a <xref:System.Web.SiteMapNode> object that is returned from a provider.
trans-unit.target: Le raccolte SiteMapNodeCollection restituiti dal <xref:System.Web.SiteMapNode.GetAllNodes%2A?displayProperty=fullName>e <xref:System.Web.UI.IHierarchyData.GetChildren%2A>metodi sono di sola lettura, come è SiteMapNodeCollection che viene restituito quando il <xref:System.Web.SiteMapNode.ChildNodes%2A>in cui si accede alla proprietà un <xref:System.Web.SiteMapNode>oggetto restituito da un provider.</xref:System.Web.SiteMapNode> </xref:System.Web.SiteMapNode.ChildNodes%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.IHierarchyData.GetChildren%2A> </xref:System.Web.SiteMapNode.GetAllNodes%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.NotSupportedException> exception is thrown, if you attempt to modify a read-only SiteMapNodeCollection by setting the default indexer property or by using any of the following methods: - <xref:System.Web.SiteMapNodeCollection.Add%2A> - <xref:System.Web.SiteMapNodeCollection.AddRange%2A> - <xref:System.Web.SiteMapNodeCollection.Clear%2A> - <xref:System.Web.SiteMapNodeCollection.Insert%2A> - <xref:System.Web.SiteMapNodeCollection.Remove%2A> - <xref:System.Web.SiteMapNodeCollection.RemoveAt%2A> Use the <xref:System.Web.SiteMapNodeCollection.IsReadOnly%2A> property to check the collection before calling any of the methods in the preceding list.
trans-unit.target: Oggetto <xref:System.NotSupportedException>viene generata l'eccezione, se si tenta di modificare un SiteMapNodeCollection di sola lettura impostando la proprietà dell'indicizzatore predefinita oppure utilizzando uno dei metodi seguenti:- <xref:System.Web.SiteMapNodeCollection.Add%2A>- <xref:System.Web.SiteMapNodeCollection.AddRange%2A>- <xref:System.Web.SiteMapNodeCollection.Clear%2A>- <xref:System.Web.SiteMapNodeCollection.Insert%2A>- <xref:System.Web.SiteMapNodeCollection.Remove%2A>- <xref:System.Web.SiteMapNodeCollection.RemoveAt%2A>utilizzare il <xref:System.Web.SiteMapNodeCollection.IsReadOnly%2A>proprietà per controllare la raccolta prima di chiamare uno dei metodi nell'elenco precedente.</xref:System.Web.SiteMapNodeCollection.IsReadOnly%2A> </xref:System.Web.SiteMapNodeCollection.RemoveAt%2A> </xref:System.Web.SiteMapNodeCollection.Remove%2A> </xref:System.Web.SiteMapNodeCollection.Insert%2A> </xref:System.Web.SiteMapNodeCollection.Clear%2A> </xref:System.Web.SiteMapNodeCollection.AddRange%2A> </xref:System.Web.SiteMapNodeCollection.Add%2A> </xref:System.NotSupportedException>

trans-unit.target: Inizializza una nuova istanza di <xref href="System.Web.SiteMapNodeCollection"> </xref> (classe), ovvero l'istanza predefinita.

trans-unit.source: The array that is passed to the AddRange method can contain `null` values; however, this leads to unexpected exceptions when the <xref:System.Web.SiteMapNodeCollection> collection is manipulated.

trans-unit.target: Determina l'uguaglianza chiamando il metodo contiene il <xref:System.Object.Equals%2A?displayProperty=fullName>metodo.</xref:System.Object.Equals%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: Copies the entire collection to a compatible one-dimensional array, starting at the specified index of the target array.
trans-unit.target: Copia l'intera raccolta in una matrice unidimensionale compatibile, iniziando dall'indice specificato della matrice di destinazione.

trans-unit.source: The CopyTo method delegates to the <xref:System.Collections.CollectionBase.List%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property, which accounts for the possible exceptions that are listed in "Exceptions."
trans-unit.target: I delegati del metodo CopyTo alla <xref:System.Collections.CollectionBase.List%2A?displayProperty=fullName>proprietà, quali account per le possibili eccezioni che sono elencate in "Eccezioni".</xref:System.Collections.CollectionBase.List%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: The one-dimensional array that must have zero-based indexing and is the destination of the elements copied from the <xref href="System.Web.SiteMapNodeCollection"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Deve avere un'indicizzazione in base zero che rappresenta la destinazione degli elementi copiati dalla matrice unidimensionale di <xref href="System.Web.SiteMapNodeCollection"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The zero-based index in `array` at which copying begins.
trans-unit.target: Indice in base zero `array` da cui avviare la copia.

trans-unit.source: array is .
trans-unit.target: arrayis .

trans-unit.source: index is less than zero.
trans-unit.target: indexè minore di zero.

trans-unit.source: array is multidimensional.
trans-unit.target: arrayè multidimensionale.

trans-unit.source: -or- The number of objects in the source is greater than the available space from index to the end of array.
trans-unit.target: - oppure - il numero di gli oggetti dell'origine è maggiore dello spazio disponibile da index alla fine di array.

trans-unit.source: Gets an object that can be used to synchronize access to the collection.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene un oggetto che può essere usato per sincronizzare l'accesso alla raccolta.

trans-unit.source: Enumerating through a <xref:System.Web.SiteMapNodeCollection> collection is intrinsically not a thread safe procedure.
trans-unit.target: L'enumerazione di una <xref:System.Web.SiteMapNodeCollection>raccolta non è quindi una procedura thread-safe.</xref:System.Web.SiteMapNodeCollection>

trans-unit.source: Even when a <xref:System.Web.SiteMapNodeCollection> is synchronized, other threads can still modify the <xref:System.Web.SiteMapNodeCollection>, which causes the enumerator to throw an exception.
trans-unit.target: Anche quando un <xref:System.Web.SiteMapNodeCollection>è sincronizzata, altri thread può modificare il <xref:System.Web.SiteMapNodeCollection>, che comporta l'enumeratore generare un'eccezione.</xref:System.Web.SiteMapNodeCollection> </xref:System.Web.SiteMapNodeCollection>

trans-unit.source: To guarantee thread safety during enumeration, you can either lock the <xref:System.Web.SiteMapNodeCollection> during the entire enumeration or catch the exceptions resulting from changes that are made by other threads.
trans-unit.target: Per garantire la protezione dei thread durante l'enumerazione, è possibile bloccare la <xref:System.Web.SiteMapNodeCollection>durante l'intera enumerazione oppure intercettare le eccezioni determinate dalle modifiche apportate da altri thread.</xref:System.Web.SiteMapNodeCollection>

trans-unit.target: Oggetto che può essere utilizzato per sincronizzare l'accesso al <xref href="System.Web.SiteMapNodeCollection"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Determines the index of the specific item in the collection that is returned by the <xref:System.Collections.IList> interface.
trans-unit.target: Determina l'indice dell'elemento specifico nella raccolta restituita dal <xref:System.Collections.IList>interfaccia.</xref:System.Collections.IList>

trans-unit.source: For a description of this member, see <xref:System.Collections.IList.IndexOf%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.
trans-unit.target: Per una descrizione di questo membro, vedere <xref:System.Collections.IList.IndexOf%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.

trans-unit.source: The object to locate in the <xref:System.Collections.IList>.
trans-unit.target: Oggetto da individuare nella <xref:System.Collections.IList>.</xref:System.Collections.IList>

trans-unit.source: The index of the value, in the list, if found; otherwise, -1.
trans-unit.target: L'indice del valore, nell'elenco, se trovato; in caso contrario, -1.

trans-unit.source: Inserts an item into the collection in the <xref:System.Collections.IList> interface at the specified index.
trans-unit.target: Inserisce un elemento nella raccolta nel <xref:System.Collections.IList>interfaccia in corrispondenza dell'indice specificato.</xref:System.Collections.IList>

trans-unit.source: For a description of this member, see <xref:System.Collections.IList.Insert%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.
trans-unit.target: Per una descrizione di questo membro, vedere <xref:System.Collections.IList.Insert%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.

trans-unit.source: The zero-based `index` at which to insert `value`.
trans-unit.target: In base zero `index` in corrispondenza del quale inserire `value`.

trans-unit.source: The object to insert into the <xref:System.Collections.IList>.
trans-unit.target: Oggetto da inserire in <xref:System.Collections.IList>.</xref:System.Collections.IList>

trans-unit.source: Gets a <xref uid="langword_csharp_Boolean" name="Boolean" href=""></xref> value indicating whether the collection has a fixed size.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene un <xref uid="langword_csharp_Boolean" name="Boolean" href=""> </xref> valore che indica se la raccolta ha dimensioni fisse.

trans-unit.source: For a description of this member, see <xref:System.Collections.IList.IsFixedSize%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.
trans-unit.target: Per una descrizione di questo membro, vedere <xref:System.Collections.IList.IsFixedSize%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the <xref href="System.Web.SiteMapNodeCollection"></xref> is read-only; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se il <xref href="System.Web.SiteMapNodeCollection"> </xref> è di sola lettura; in caso contrario, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets a <xref uid="langword_csharp_Boolean" name="Boolean" href=""></xref> value indicating whether the collection is read-only.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene un <xref uid="langword_csharp_Boolean" name="Boolean" href=""> </xref> valore che indica se la raccolta è di sola lettura.

trans-unit.source: For a description of this member, see <xref:System.Collections.IList.IsReadOnly%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.
trans-unit.target: Per una descrizione di questo membro, vedere <xref:System.Collections.IList.IsReadOnly%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the <xref href="System.Web.SiteMapNodeCollection"></xref> is read-only; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se il <xref href="System.Web.SiteMapNodeCollection"> </xref> è di sola lettura; in caso contrario, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets the <xref:System.Collections.IList> element at the specified index.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene il <xref:System.Collections.IList>elemento in corrispondenza dell'indice specificato.</xref:System.Collections.IList>

trans-unit.source: The zero-based index of the element to get.
trans-unit.target: Indice in base zero dell'elemento da ottenere.

trans-unit.source: The element at the specified index.
trans-unit.target: L'elemento in corrispondenza dell'indice specificato.

trans-unit.source: Removes the first occurrence of a specified object from the collection in the <xref:System.Collections.IList> interface.
trans-unit.target: Rimuove la prima occorrenza di un oggetto specificato dalla raccolta nel <xref:System.Collections.IList>interfaccia.</xref:System.Collections.IList>

trans-unit.source: For a description of this member, see <xref:System.Collections.IList.Remove%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.
trans-unit.target: Per una descrizione di questo membro, vedere <xref:System.Collections.IList.Remove%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.

trans-unit.source: The object to remove from the <xref:System.Collections.IList>.
trans-unit.target: Oggetto da rimuovere dal <xref:System.Collections.IList>.</xref:System.Collections.IList>

trans-unit.source: Removes the <xref:System.Collections.IList> item at the specified index.
trans-unit.target: Rimuove il <xref:System.Collections.IList>elemento in corrispondenza dell'indice specificato.</xref:System.Collections.IList>

trans-unit.source: For a description of this member, see <xref:System.Collections.IList.RemoveAt%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.
trans-unit.target: Per una descrizione di questo membro, vedere <xref:System.Collections.IList.RemoveAt%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.

trans-unit.source: The zero-based index of the item to remove.
trans-unit.target: Indice in base zero dell'elemento da rimuovere.

trans-unit.source: Returns a hierarchical data item for the specified enumerated item.
trans-unit.target: Restituisce un elemento di dati gerarchico per l'elemento enumerato specificato.

trans-unit.source: For a description of this member, see <xref:System.Web.UI.IHierarchicalEnumerable.GetHierarchyData%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.
trans-unit.target: Per una descrizione di questo membro, vedere <xref:System.Web.UI.IHierarchicalEnumerable.GetHierarchyData%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.

trans-unit.source: The object for which to return an <xref href="System.Web.UI.IHierarchyData"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: L'oggetto per cui restituire un <xref href="System.Web.UI.IHierarchyData"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: An <xref href="System.Web.UI.IHierarchyData"></xref> that represents the object passed to the IHierarchicalEnumerable.GetHierarchyData.
trans-unit.target: Un <xref href="System.Web.UI.IHierarchyData"> </xref> che rappresenta l'oggetto passato per il IHierarchicalEnumerable.GetHierarchyData.
